text: Is there a function that I can run to do this?

elements.text: Is there a function that I can run to do this?

text:
```julia> using CUDA
[ Info: Precompiling CUDA [052768ef-5323-5732-b1bb-66c8b64840ba]

julia> CUDA.__init_dependencies__()
┌ Error: Error during initialization of CUDA.jl
│   exception =
│    could not load library "libcuda.so.1"

julia> ENV["JULIA_CUDA_VERSION"] = "11.2"
"11.2"

julia> CUDA.__init_dependencies__()
Downloading artifact: CUDA112```

elements.text:
julia> using CUDA
[ Info: Precompiling CUDA [052768ef-5323-5732-b1bb-66c8b64840ba]

julia> CUDA.__init_dependencies__()
┌ Error: Error during initialization of CUDA.jl
│   exception =
│    could not load library "libcuda.so.1"

julia> ENV["JULIA_CUDA_VERSION"] = "11.2"
"11.2"

julia> CUDA.__init_dependencies__()
Downloading artifact: CUDA112

text: either you do that for all the CUDA versions you want to support, or you check which driver your main system has
